About Me Projects

My Expertise

Machine Learning Engineer with 2+years of experience building data-driven solutions to increase efficiency and accuracy. Experienced at creating and maintaining ETL pipelines for predictive data modeling, data analysis, and visualization.

Languages

Proficient in Python, with some experience in Java, Matlab and R.

MachineLearning Tools

Apart from TF and Keras, my journey is coupled with Apache Spark, SQL, Numpy, Pandas, NLTK, Matplotlib etc.

Developer Tools

Featured Projects

Throughput model

  • Featured Skills
    • - Python, Ternsorflow, Keras, Computer Vision (Object Detection API)

The aim is to increase the throughput of digital drive-thru by tracking average serve time and in turn, recommending products with lesser preparation time. This can further be used to capture number plates of traffic offenders.

Check it out

Dialogue System

  • Featured Skills
    • - Python, Ternsorflow, Keras, Natural Language Processing (Seq2Seq models, LSTM, GRU)

This research is intended to build dialogue systems which are not just rule-based domain or task specific, with an eye to model an empathetic chatbot which could converse with a human being.
